name: Webapp Testing
description: Toolkit for interacting with and testing local web applications using Playwright. Supports verifying frontend functionality, debugging UI behavior, capturing browser screenshots, and viewing browser logs.
longDescription: Test local web applications using Playwright with included Python examples for element discovery, console log capture, and static HTML automation. Provides a server wrapper script that starts your app, runs tests, and tears down cleanly. Covers screenshots, DOM inspection, and browser log viewing for debugging frontend issues without manual browser interaction.
